content.prompt: Which of the following pieces of evidence would most directly support the argument about the Holocaust described by Marrus?

choices.label: Hitler associated Bolshevism and communism with the Jewish people.
Hitler believed that the German people were entitled to “living space” in eastern Europe.
Hitler called for the elimination of the Jewish people from Europe in his early 1920s autobiography Mein Kampf.
Hitler supported the elimination of Gypsies and other non-Jewish minorities he deemed undesirable.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
